content: this adorable crochet sun doll has playfully long limbs it s perfect for toting along on the next adventure or using as a small pillow and it works up fast with one skein of bulky weight polyester yarn this was originally release in 3 parts as the twenty-first weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 and has been updated with the big reveal > **this pattern is
